bodyweight.name: Push-Up
bodyweight.description: A classic upper-body exercise. Start in a high plank with hands shoulder-width apart. Lower your chest to the floor keeping your body straight, then push back up.

bodyweight.name: Bodyweight Squat
bodyweight.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Lower yourself as if sitting in a chair until thighs are parallel to the floor, then stand back up.

bodyweight.name: Plank
bodyweight.description: Support your body on forearms and toes. Keep a straight line from head to heels. Engage core and hold the position.

bodyweight.name: Glute Bridge
bodyweight.description: Lie on your back, knees bent, feet flat. Push through heels to lift hips until body forms a straight line from shoulders to knees. Squeeze glutes at the top.

bodyweight.name: Mountain Climber
bodyweight.description: Start in a high plank. Drive one knee toward your chest, then quickly switch legs in a running motion. Keep hips level throughout.

bodyweight.name: Tricep Dip (Chair)
bodyweight.description: Sit on the edge of a stable chair. Hands grip the edge beside your hips. Slide forward, then lower yourself by bending elbows to 90¬∞. Push back up.

bodyweight.name: Superman Hold
bodyweight.description: Lie face down on the floor. Simultaneously lift your arms, chest, and legs off the ground. Hold briefly, then lower with control.

bodyweight.name: High Knees
bodyweight.description: Stand in place and run, bringing knees up to hip height. Pump arms in rhythm. Keep a steady, quick pace for cardio benefit.

bodyweight.name: Shoulder Tap
bodyweight.description: Start in a high plank. Lift one hand to tap the opposite shoulder while keeping hips still. Alternate sides in a controlled manner.

bodyweight.name: Reverse Crunch
bodyweight.description: Lie on your back with knees bent at 90¬∞. Engage abs to curl knees toward your chest, lifting hips slightly off the floor. Lower slowly with control.

home_gym.name: Dumbbell Curl
home_gym.description: Stand with dumbbells at your sides, palms forward. Curl both weights up toward your shoulders, keeping elbows at your sides. Lower slowly.

home_gym.name: Dumbbell Goblet Squat
home_gym.description: Hold one dumbbell vertically at chest height. Squat until thighs are parallel to the floor, keeping chest up and knees tracking over toes.

home_gym.name: Dumbbell Row
home_gym.description: Place one hand and knee on a bench. Hold a dumbbell with the other hand. Pull the weight up toward your hip, leading with your elbow. Lower with control.

home_gym.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
home_gym.description: Sit or stand with dumbbells at ear level, palms forward. Press the weights overhead until arms are extended. Lower slowly back to start.

home_gym.name: Resistance Band Pull Apart
home_gym.description: Hold a resistance band in front of you at shoulder height, hands shoulder-width apart. Pull the band apart until your arms are fully extended to the sides.

home_gym.name: Dumbbell Lunge
home_gym.description: Hold dumbbells at your sides. Step forward with one foot and lower until both knees are at 90¬∞. Push back to standing. Alternate legs.

home_gym.name: Dumbbell Chest Press
home_gym.description: Lie on your back with dumbbells at chest level, elbows bent. Press the weights up over your chest until arms are extended. Lower with control.

home_gym.name: Resistance Band Squat
home_gym.description: Stand on a resistance band and hold both ends at shoulder level. Perform a squat, keeping tension in the band throughout the movement.

home_gym.name: Dumbbell Calf Raise
home_gym.description: Stand with dumbbells at your sides, feet hip-width apart. Rise up on your toes as high as possible. Pause, then lower slowly.

home_gym.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
home_gym.description: Stand with dumbbells at your sides. Raise both arms out to the sides until they reach shoulder level. Lower slowly. Keep a slight bend in elbows.

outdoor.name: Park Bench Step-Up
outdoor.description: Face a park bench. Step up with one foot, then the other, so you're standing on the bench. Step back down one foot at a time. Alternate the leading foot.

outdoor.name: Walking Lunge
outdoor.description: Step forward with one foot and lower into a lunge. Rise up and bring the back foot forward to a lunge on the other side. Continue walking forward.

outdoor.name: Incline Push-Up (Bench)
outdoor.description: Place hands on a park bench, shoulder-width apart. Perform a push-up at this inclined angle. The incline reduces difficulty and targets upper chest.

outdoor.name: Sprint Interval
outdoor.description: Sprint at maximum effort for 20-30 seconds, then walk for 60 seconds. Repeat. Find an open path in a park or field.

outdoor.name: Bear Crawl
outdoor.description: Start on all fours with knees hovering 2 inches off the ground. Move forward by stepping right hand and left foot together, then left hand and right foot.

outdoor.name: Bench Dip
outdoor.description: Place hands on a park bench behind you with legs extended. Lower your body by bending elbows to 90¬∞, then push back up.

outdoor.name: Jump Rope (Imaginary)
outdoor.description: Mimic jump rope motion without a rope. Hop on both feet or alternate feet at a steady rhythm. Excellent low-cost cardio exercise outdoors.

outdoor.name: Lateral Shuffle
outdoor.description: Get into a half-squat stance. Shuffle quickly to one side for 5 steps, then shuffle back. Keep knees bent and stay low throughout.

outdoor.name: Decline Push-Up (Bench)
outdoor.description: Place feet on a park bench and hands on the ground. Perform a push-up at this declined angle. Targets upper chest and shoulders.

outdoor.name: Broad Jump
outdoor.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Swing arms and bend knees to load. Jump forward as far as possible, landing softly with bent knees.

calisthenics.name: Pull-Up
calisthenics.description: Hang from a bar with hands slightly wider than shoulder-width, palms facing away. Pull yourself up until your chin clears the bar, then lower slowly with control.

calisthenics.name: Chin-Up
calisthenics.description: Hang from a bar with palms facing toward you, hands shoulder-width apart. Pull up until chin is above the bar, squeezing biceps at the top. Lower under control.

calisthenics.name: Parallel Bar Dip
calisthenics.description: Support yourself on parallel bars with arms extended. Lower your body by bending elbows until upper arms are parallel to the ground. Press back up to full extension.

calisthenics.name: Hanging Knee Raise
calisthenics.description: Hang from a bar with arms extended. Engage core and raise knees toward chest, then lower with control. Keep shoulders packed throughout.

calisthenics.name: L-Sit Hold
calisthenics.description: Support yourself on parallel bars or the floor. Extend legs straight in front of you, parallel to the ground, while keeping arms straight. Hold this position.

calisthenics.name: Ring Push-Up
calisthenics.description: Set gymnastics rings at chest height. Hold a ring in each hand, perform a push-up. The instability of the rings engages more stabilizer muscles than a regular push-up.

calisthenics.name: Australian Pull-Up (Inverted Row)
calisthenics.description: Set a bar at waist height. Hang beneath it with heels on the ground, body straight. Pull your chest to the bar, then lower. Great pull-up progression.

calisthenics.name: Muscle-Up
calisthenics.description: Begin with a pull-up. At the top, transition your grip and push up so arms extend above the bar. Requires significant strength and technique.

calisthenics.name: Pike Push-Up
calisthenics.description: Start in a downward dog position with hips raised. Bend elbows to lower your head toward the floor between your hands, then push back up. Targets shoulders.

calisthenics.name: Pistol Squat
calisthenics.description: Stand on one leg, extend the other forward. Lower yourself on the standing leg until your hip is below the knee, then stand back up. Advanced single-leg squat.
